summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Judicial Agreement System (Sistema de controle de acordos judiciais). All core functionality working correctly including JWT authentication, CRUD operations, automatic installment generation, status calculations, and professional UI.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components
design_issues.impact: Accessibility warning only, no functional impact

passed_tests: JWT Authentication with test credentials (advogado@teste.com / senha123)
Case CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Search and filtering by debtor name, agreement status, beneficiary
Agreement creation with automatic installment generation
Installment status calculation based on dates
Agreement status calculation based on installment statuses
Cases listing with all filters working
Case detail page with three tabs (Acordo, Parcelas, Resumo)
Tab navigation between Acordo, Parcelas, and Resumo
